subject: Re: [sugar] GSoC new developer
body:
> My project is about distributed electronic voting system. More details 
> are here http://wiki.laptop.org/go/Stirme

Hmm, I'm sure it's not the specific intention of this project, but am I 
the only one that thinks it would be insanely cool to have something 
like the Nintendo Wii's "Everybody Votes" channel with the scale of OLPC?

http://www.bazaarblog.com/2007/02/18/nintendo-wii-everybody-votes/

--ryan.
